summary: Completed comprehensive backend testing of Monday.com Banner Auto-Sync feature. All 13 tests passed (100%). Auto-sync configuration endpoints work correctly - GET returns config with scheduler status, PUT enables/disables auto-sync and updates interval. Interval clamping works (1-1440 min). Scheduler correctly stays paused when Monday integration is not fully configured. Existing banner CRUD and Monday config endpoints still functional.
passed_tests: GET /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/auto-sync - Returns auto-sync config with enabled, interval_minutes, scheduler status, and last_sync (200)
PUT /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/auto-sync - Enable auto-sync returns updated scheduler status (200)
PUT /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/auto-sync - Disable auto-sync pauses the scheduler (200)
PUT /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/auto-sync - Change interval_minutes to 5 min works (200)
PUT /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/auto-sync - Interval clamped to minimum 1 minute (value 0 -> 1)
PUT /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/auto-sync - Interval clamped to maximum 1440 minutes (value 2000 -> 1440)
Scheduler reports running=True, paused=True when Monday integration not configured (no board_id)
GET /api/admin/showcase/banners - Returns list of banners (10 banners found)
GET /api/showcase/banners - Public endpoint returns active banners (7 banners)
Full end-to-end flow: get config -> enable -> verify -> change interval -> disable -> restore
critical_code_review_comments: Auto-sync implementation uses APScheduler correctly with pause/resume pattern
Interval clamping logic: max(1, min(body.get('interval_minutes', 10), 1440)) works correctly
Scheduler status correctly reports paused=True when auto-sync disabled or Monday integration not configured
Config persistence in MongoDB app_config collection works correctly
Scheduler lifecycle properly managed in main.py startup/shutdown events
test_credentials: No auth required for admin showcase endpoints

seed_data_used.existing_banners: 10 banners in database, 7 active public banners

context_for_next_testing_agent: Auto-sync feature fully tested. Key endpoints: GET /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/auto-sync (get config), PUT /api/admin/showcase/monday-banners/auto-sync (enable/disable/change interval). Scheduler status shows running=True,paused=True when Monday integration not configured. When Monday integration enabled (with board_id) AND auto-sync enabled, scheduler should resume (paused=False, next_run populated). APScheduler manages the job with ID 'monday_banner_auto_sync'. Banner CRUD endpoints tested at /api/admin/showcase/banners.

observations.scheduler_behavior: Currently scheduler is paused because Monday integration is not fully configured (enabled=False, board_id=empty). This is expected behavior per requirements.
observations.interval_clamping: Values below 1 are clamped to 1, values above 1440 are clamped to 1440 (24 hours max)
observations.config_persistence: Auto-sync config stored under monday_banner_config.auto_sync in app_config collection
